title: Calculate Contribution Response to MAAT
description: Response data following calculation of appeal contributions

contributionId.description: The ID of the contribution entry

repId.description: The ID of the representation order

effectiveDate.description: The date the current contribution entry was made effective, based on the date set of the last outcome

calcDate.description: The date the current contribution entry was created

upliftApplied.description: Indicates if an income uplift was applied

basedOn.description: Indicates what the contributions are based on (e.g. Means assessment)

createContributionOrder.description: Indicates whether a contribution order should be created

replacedDate.description: The date that this contribution entry was replaced

latest.description: Indicates if this is the latest contribution entry

ccOutcomeCount.description: The count of crown court outcomes

processActivity.description: Indicator to call MATRIX process activity
